MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.30pm to repair an underground cable fault on Hardridge Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.23pm on Monday 22nd February 2021.
